attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To help increase equality in Britain we should set a maximum wage for all working in this country.
We have the minimum wage, so the maximum could be set, to be fair, at, say, ten times that minimum.
This would encourage the better paid to support the raising of the minimum wage, thus benefiting themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
